about_the_game:
Project: 13.42㎡ is a uniquely designed VR wallpaper game that integrates rich building and interactive elements. In this virtual world, you have complete freedom to design and construct your own personalized space. Whether it’s a cozy and warm little house, a futuristic tech-filled room, or a fantastical otherworldly scene, you can create it all just the way you like. The game supports the use of VR controllers to interact with various objects in the environment, allowing you to touch and adjust every detail yourself to craft a truly one-of-a-kind space.

You can temporarily escape the constraints of reality and immerse yourself in a world that is entirely your own. Whether you’re looking to relax, explore your creativity, or simply experience a way of life completely different from the one you know, this game is designed to meet your expectations. You’re not just building a scene; you’re creating a spiritual haven where your dreams and emotions can take root. We hope this game brings you an immersive experience like no other, offering you a fresh perspective to rediscover the beauty of life.

In this virtual world, you have complete freedom to design and construct your own personalized space. Whether it’s a cozy and warm little house, a futuristic tech-filled room, or a fantastical otherworldly scene, you can create it all just the way you like. The game supports the use of VR controllers to interact with various objects in the environment, allowing you to touch and adjust every detail yourself to craft a truly one-of-a-kind space.

You can temporarily escape the constraints of reality and immerse yourself in a world that is entirely your own. Whether you’re looking to relax, explore your creativity, or simply experience a way of life completely different from the one you know, this game is designed to meet your expectations. You’re not just building a scene; you’re creating a spiritual haven where your dreams and emotions can take root. name: Project:13.42㎡

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • VR Support: Device support under SteamVR enabled: Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest 3s, PICO Neo 3
  • Additional Notes: Due to limitations in manpower and equipment, the testing was limited. Devices with performance equal to or higher than the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 TI are definitely supported, but devices with 20-series graphics cards cannot use this project.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700KF
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: Device support under SteamVR enabled: Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest 3s, PICO Neo 3
  • Additional Notes: Due to limitations in manpower and equipment, the testing was limited. Devices with performance equal to or higher than the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 TI are definitely supported, but devices with 20-series graphics cards cannot use this project.

short_description: Project: 13.42㎡ is a uniquely designed VR wallpaper game that incorporates rich building and interactive elements. In this virtual world, you have complete freedom to design and create your own personalized space.
